snippet: Hôtel Drouot, founded in 1852 and comprising 72 independent auction companies, is trying to transform itself into something more relevant in a fiercely competitive art market.
lead_paragraph: Hôtel Drouot, founded in 1852 and comprising 72 independent auction companies, is trying to transform itself into something more relevant in a fiercely competitive art market.

headline.main: French Auction House Trades Haughty for Hip
headline.print_headline: French Auction House Trades Haughty for Hip
